content.2: Ye know that ye were Gentiles, carried away unto these dumb idols, even as ye were led.
content.3: Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and
content.4: Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.
content.5: And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.
content.6: And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
content.7: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.
content.8: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;
content.9: To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;
content.10: To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another
content.11: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
content.12: For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also
content.13: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body, whether
content.14: For the body is not one member, but many.
content.15: If the foot shall say, Because I am not the hand, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
content.16: And if the ear shall say, Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
content.18: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.
content.19: And if they were all one member, where
content.21: And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.
content.22: Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:
content.25: That there should be no schism in the body; but
content.26: And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
content.27: Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.
content.28: And God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues.
content.30: Have all the gifts of healing? do all speak with tongues? do all interpret?
content.31: But covet earnestly the best gifts: and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way.
